      int Controller.getChoice()
      method gets user input, validates it, and returns that input if it's valid.
      java.lang.String Controller.getInput()
      gets user input of type String, validates it, and then returns it if it is valid, otherwise will keep asking for input.
      static void Main.main(java.lang.String[] args) 
      void IController.runProgram()
      This method displays the menu to the user, uses a try-catch block to read in the input from the user and, based on the user's choice, calls one of the three "convert..." methods in this class.
      void Controller.runProgram() 
      static boolean Controller.validateInput(java.lang.String input, java.lang.String validationType)
      method validates input and returns false if input is not valid and true if the input is valid.
